author: AngelCalvo
body:
- [ ] Resolves issue #abcd.
- [ ] Code is [rebased](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/git/powershell-repository-101.md#sync-your-local-repo) on `origin/master`.
- [ ] Add tests that fail without your changes.
- [ ] Update all relevant [documentation](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/master/docs).

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Please hold off until #1546 is in.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: I rebased it onto master so it's not conflicted.

title: Update README.md
